## Load Data

```{r}
df <- read.csv("../_raw/project_data.csv")
head(df)
```

## Save loaded data

```{r}
write.table(df, file = "../data/01_dat_load.tsv", sep = "\t", row.names = FALSE)

df <- read.table(file = "../data/01_dat_load.tsv", sep = "\t", header = TRUE)
head(df)
```
